languages.text: "Амарнат верил, что сможет воссоединиться? План выглядит... ненадежным".
"Did Amarnat believe he could form again? The plan sounds... risky."
languages.original_text: "Амарнат верил, что сможет воссоединиться? План выглядит... ненадежным".

traits.locale_text: "Did Amarnat believe he could come together again? The plan sounds... unreliable."
"Did Amarnat believe he could come together again? The plan sounds... unreliable."
"Did Amarnat believe he could form again? The plan sounds... unreliable."
"Did Amarnat believe he could form again? The plan sounds... unreliable."
"Did Amarnat believe he could form again? The plan sounds... risky."
"Did Amarnat believe he could form again? The plan sounds... risky."

languages.text: 「アマルナトは再び復活できると考えていたというのか？計画というには…危険だな」
languages.original_text: "Did Amarnat believe he could form again? The plan sounds... risky."

traits.locale_text: 「アマルナトは再び復活できると考えていたというのか？計画というには…危険だな」

languages.text: “阿玛纳特当时真的认为他能复原吗？这个计划听起来……很有风险。”
languages.original_text: "Did Amarnat believe he could form again? The plan sounds... risky."

traits.locale_text: “阿玛纳特当时真的认为他能复原吗？这个计划听起来……很不可靠。”

languages.text: « Amarnat pensait vraiment pouvoir se reformer un jour ? Ça a l'air... risqué. »
languages.original_text: "Did Amarnat believe he could form again? The plan sounds... risky."

traits.locale_text: « Amarnat pensait vraiment pouvoir se reformer un jour ? Ça n'a pas l'air d'être un plan très... fiable. »

languages.text: «¿De verdad Amarnat creyó que podía volver a formarse? Suena bastante... peligroso».
languages.original_text: "Did Amarnat believe he could form again? The plan sounds... risky."

traits.locale_text: «¿De verdad Amarnat creyó que podía volver a formarse? Suena bastante... imposible».

languages.text: "Dachte Amarnat, er könne wieder Gestalt annehmen? Der Plan klingt ... riskant."
languages.original_text: "Did Amarnat believe he could form again? The plan sounds... risky."

traits.locale_text: "Dachte Amarnat, er könne wieder Gestalt annehmen? Der Plan klingt ... unzuverlässig."

languages.text: "Amarnat yeniden bir araya gelebileceğine mi inanıyordu? Bu plan fazlasıyla riskli duruyor."
languages.original_text: "Did Amarnat believe he could form again? The plan sounds... risky."

traits.locale_text: "Amarnat yeniden bir araya gelebileceğine mi inanıyordu? Bu plan fazlasıyla riskli duruyor."
